title: How do you view your recordings made with replays.gg?
body: Title.  I got as far as actually seeing them from spectators view but.... IDK HOW TO GET THE RECORDINGS THAT I DID.  help...

replies.body:
Since you're using replays.gg, I can't provide support with this. However, once you've upgraded to the Beta client, you'll have access to the built-in replays feature that's live on NA now. 

Let me know if you have any questions about that system.
Um, yeah when do we get that, cuz I havn't gotten any notification?
Whenever you upgrade to the new Open Beta client, which is out now, you'll be able to access replays from your match history inside the client.
Yep I got it now.  Looks real cool.  But there is just one thing that could be improved - NOTHING.  GJ riot.
